messages.messageBody:

>

we

> the fall, and plan to stretch that to a few extra days in the NY/NJ area.
> Before we started hsing at the end of this past yer, I had it in the back
of
>
> my mind that I was going to have to explain this 1-2 week absence to
someone.

Doesn't it feel great! Yippee!

Eiraul (say Ee-rawl...It's Laurie pronounced backwards. Well, almost! BG)

messages.subject: Re: travel plans
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/22/99 6:40:26 PM !!!First Boot!!!, Braunville@aol.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/22/99 6:40:26 PM !!!First Boot!!!, Braunville@...
writes:

<< Eiraul (really, it's Laurie, but I run into enough of those that I thought
I'd use my nick name to help avoid confusion ;-)
>>


Except I can't figure out how to pronounce it -- ha ha!!

Your story of missing school to see Dad (horrors!) reminded me of a trip we
have coming up around here. We are scheduled to go to PA for a wedding in
the fall, and plan to stretch that to a few extra days in the NY/NJ area.
Before we started hsing at the end of this past yer, I had it in the back of
my mind that I was going to have to explain this 1-2 week absence to someone.
Not anymore!!!!!!

Nance (feeling smug and loving it!)
